Translations.Text: Tamen [xinshi] zai libai zhong shi qiangong de [zhu],
tamen shi bi kai [an la suo jinzhi de] yiqie wang tan de,
tamen shi wan na tian ke [zhu] de,
dui tamen de qizi huo tamen suo yongyou de nunu nu fu chuwai, yinwei zai zhe zhong qingkuang xia, tamen shi bu shou zebei de;
fan zai ci zhi wai zai you sheqiu zhe, zhexie ren que shi chaoyue fadu zhe;
tamen zhongshi yu tamen de xintuo he mengyue,
tamen anshi jin shou bai gong.
Zhexie ren que shi jicheng zhe.
Tamen jiang jicheng tiantang [leyuan], tamen jiang yong ju qizhong.
Wo que yi yong nitu de jinghua chuangzao ren [ru a dan].
Ranhou, wo ba ta zaocheng yidi jingye fang zai yige anquan chu [zigong],

Ranhou, wo ba na di jingye zaocheng ningxie, ranhou, wo ba ningxie zaocheng rou tuan [peitai], ranhou, wo ba rou tuan zaocheng guge, ranhou, wo gei guge bao shang jirou, ranhou, wo ba ta zaocheng ling yige chuangzaowu. Zansong an la zhifu! Ta shi zui hao de chuangzao zhe.
Ranhou, nimen zai fuhuo ri you jiang bei fuhuo.
Wo que yi zai nimen shangmian zaole qi ge tian [huo qitiao guidao], wo jue bu hushi suo zao wu.
